issue.title: [C++][Python] arrow/filesystem/hdfs.h and Python wrapper does not have an option for setting a path to a Kerberos ticket
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8384](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8384). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This feature seems to have been dropped

Is there a plan for migrating users to the new filesystem API? We have two different code paths now

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8384?focusedCommentId=17079484) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
That should be easy to re-add. Do you have a list of the HDFS options that are important to support?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8384?focusedCommentId=17079493) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
At minimum what's in `HdfsConnectionConfig` needs to be available

https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/cpp/src/arrow/io/hdfs.h#L87
